Replace.Text: White Eagle Federation unique building, replaces the Dockyard. +1 [ICON_Science] Science, +4 [ICON_Production] Production, Ports gain a [ICON_Production] Production bonus equal to their [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus. +1 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Admiral Point, +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer Point. [NEWLINE]Naval units produced by this city gain +50% experience and gain the ability to recover outside of their territory. +1 [ICON_Production] Production, +1 [ICON_Science] Science for coastal tiles. [NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route if the city has a Commercial Center

Trade routes to overseas cities gain +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each Luxury Resource at the destination, and +1 [ICON_Science] Science for each Strategic Resource. Foreign Trade Routes gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +2 [ICON_Food] Food. [NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_Food] Food for Coastal Cells, and +1 [ICON_Science] Science for Ocean Cells. After unlocking the "Cartography" tech, Ocean Cells gain +3 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Production] Production, and +1 [ICON_Science] Science. [NEWLINE] Cities gain 1 [ICON_Science] Science, 1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, and 1 [ICON_Production] Production for each Unique District, and +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing, and +10 [ICON_Production] Production for cities with three or more unique districts
White Eagle Federation special unit, replaces destroyer. Has high melee attack power and mobility, and strong air defense ability.

White Eagle Federation unique region, replaces the Academy. Unlike the Academy, it does not get adjacency bonuses from normal terrain, but gets standard adjacency bonuses from each adjacent coast tile, huge adjacency bonuses from each reef tile, large adjacency bonuses from ports and provides large adjacency bonuses to ports, and provides additional [ICON_GreatAdmiral] admiral points.
+50% productivity when producing aircraft carriers, +1 vision range for all units. +1 diplomatic slot. The cost of building ports and industrial zones is halved.

Siege units +1 [ICON_Movement] movement +1 vision, all trade routes +2 [ICON_Production], coastal cells +1 [ICON_Production] production. Building a military camp can release cultural bombs on nearby cells, arsenal +2 [ICON_Science] technology, military academy +5 [ICON_Science] technology
Recovery can be carried out outside the national territory
+3 [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Attack Damage to all Land Ranged Units
+8 [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Attack Damage to all naval ranged units
+5 [ICON_Bombard] Bombard attack power to all siege units
